data.text: @jdutton505 ... your 'junk' folder too). If you send us a DM with your full name, order number and delivery address we can look into what has happened and try and help to resolve this 🙂 take care, Rachel (2/2)

@jdutton505 Hey Jed, apologies for the delay, I'm so sorry that your delivery has been cancelled and that it contained Mother's Day items! I hope you are able to sort something out 🤞 you should have received an email, did you not get this? (Please do check ... (1/2)
